full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS RBAD BDUN MA LA BRTEN PA'I GDON 'DUL BYA TSUL GDUG CAN TSAR GCOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(TSUL 'DI SNGAGS PA TSAD LDAN 'GAR, ,DUS 'DIR NYE BAR MKHO MTHONG NAS, ,SPU GRI LAS RGYUD MAN NGAG BZHIN, ,DHARMA BADZRA ZHES BYAS SBYAR, ,BSOD NAMS GDONG LNGA'I NGAR SKAD KYIS, ,LEGS TSOGS PADMA'I RTZA BA KUN, ,'JOMS BYED NAG PHYOGS GLANG PO'I TSOGS, ,KLANG BUM GCIG CHAR BAGS GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS,, ,,` GSER SKYEMS NYI, RAm YAm KHAm, 'BRU GSUM LAN GSUM GYIS BYIN GYIS BRLABS, @006B H'Um BYIN BRLAB THUGS RJE'I GTER MDZOD BLA MA DANG, ,DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS YI DAM BKA' BRGYAD LHA, ,DGRA BGEGS SGROL MDZAD BKA' SDOD BSRUNG MA'I TSOGS, ,GSER SKYEMS 'DI BZHES GZU DANG DBANG MDZOD CIG ,KHYAD PAR KHRO BO'I RGYAL PO BCOM LDAN 'DAS, ,DBANG CHEN KHRAG 'THUNG RTA MCHOG ROL BA DANG, , DAM PA'I CHOS SKYONG GTER GYI BSRUNG MA'I TSOGS, ,GZHAN YANG BSTAN SRUNGS DAM CAN RGYA MTSO'I TSOGS, ,YUL LHA GZHI BDAG SA YI LHA MO DANG, ,LO ZLA ZHAG DUS GZA' DANG CHOS KYI LHA, ,GZU DBANG NI, TSUL LDAN DAM TSIG SDOM PA'I GZHI RTEN BZUNG, ,THOS DANG BSAM PA'I NOR GYIS RGYUD BLTAMS NAS, ,GSANG SNGAGS NYE LAM SGRUBS PA'I RNAL  'BYOR LA, ,GNOD PA'I DGRA BGEGS BYUNG NGOR MNGA' MDZOD, ,RANG DON SRID ZHI'I BDE 'BRAS RGYAB TU BSKYAR, ,GZHAN PHYIR SKU GSUM GO 'PHANG 'THOB PA'I LAM, ,SNYING NAS TSUL BZHIN SGRUB PAR 'DOD PA LA, ,GNOD PA'I DGRA BGEGS LTA BSGOM RTZAL LDAN DAM RDZAS MA LUS BSHAMS, ,BSNYEN SGRUB MCHOD GTOR CHU BO'I RGYUN BZHIN 'BAD, ,DAM CAN LUS DANG GRIB MA LTAR BSTEN NA, ,GNOD PA'I DGRA BGEGS, ,RTA THO NI, H'Um` RTA MCHOG ROL BA'I DKYIL 'KHOR DU, ,DUG LNGA LAS SKYES DGRA DANG BGEGS, ,DAM SRI 'BYUNG PO'I SNYING KHA RU, ,DPAL CHEN DRAG PO'I BRO BRTUNGS PAS` `NYON MONGS YE SHES DBYINGS SU BCOM, ,SNGANG DGRA GNOD BYED THAL BAR RLOMS, ,GZUGS MED GDON GYI DPUNG TSOGS RNAMS, ,BSGRAL BAS MNAN PA'I CHO GA RDZOGS, ,)
